code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactUs=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:"",email:"",description:""});const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:8000/contact",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(formData)});const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){setMessage(data.message);}else{setMessage(data.error);}}catch(error){setMessage("Error sending message.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-200 p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Contact Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",name:"name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",name:"email",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"description",children:"Message:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{id:"description",name:"description",value:formData.description,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Send Message"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message})]});};export default ContactUs;
